pageContent: Purpose: Based on contemporary epidemiological and pathological characteristics of prostate cancer we explain the rationale for and concerns about focal therapy for low risk prostate cancer, review potential methods of delivery and propose study design parameters.

metaData.source:
Sonablate-500: transrectal high-intensity focused ultrasound for the treatment of prostate cancer
